results.name: Triangle read by rows: (1/n)*T(n,h), where T(n,h) is the array in A101817.
formula: T(n, h)=(1/n)*C(n, h)*U(n, h), where U(n, h) is the array in A019538.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Dec 17 2004
